title: Define Project Scope and Requirements - Emotional Intelligence Coach AI System (Revised)
description: Clearly outline the project requirements for the Emotional Intelligence Coach AI system. This includes defining the scope of emotional intelligence coaching, simulated leadership challenges, desired user experience (UX), target audience, platform requirements (Web, Mobile, VR/AR), and integration with existing systems (if any). Additionally, detail the expected outcomes and success criteria. Clearly distinguish between functional (user-facing) and non-functional (performance, reliability, usability) requirements. Provide examples of specific emotional intelligence skills to be addressed, potential leadership scenarios, user personas, UX/UI wireframes, system integration points, performance benchmarks for the AI system, and realistic timelines for each task or feature. Include a list of APIs and SDKs that may be needed for integration. Also, consider edge cases and provide solutions for them. To facilitate understanding, break down the functional requirements into smaller tasks for easier implementation. The revised RFC addresses the following areas: Functional Requirements (updated), Non-functional Requirements, User Personas, Emotional Intelligence Skills, Leadership Scenarios, UI/UX Design (updated), Integration Points, APIs & SDKs, Edge Cases, and Timelines. Note that the Functional Requirements and UI/UX Design sections have been updated for clarity.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the AI coaching engine, simulation environment, and user interface components.

title: Develop AI Coaching Engine
description: Implement the AI engine responsible for analyzing user behavior, providing emotional intelligence coaching, and adapting to user feedback.

title: Build Simulation Environment
description: Create the simulated leadership challenge environment, including scenarios, characters, and interactive elements.

title: Develop User Interface
description: Design and implement the user interface for interacting with the AI coach and simulated environment.

title: Implement Data Storage and Management
description: Set up the database and data management systems for storing user data, simulation data, and coaching logs.

title: Establish Security and Privacy Measures
description: Implement security measures to protect user data and ensure privacy compliance.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Configure the CI/CD pipeline for automated testing, building, and deployment of the application.

title: Conduct Quality Assurance and Testing
description: Develop and execute comprehensive test plans to ensure the application's functionality, usability, and performance.

title: Write User Documentation
description: Create user guides, tutorials, and other documentation to assist users in effectively utilizing the application.
